title: Is Norm Solo Queue Matching Random?
body:
So in Norms, do you get matched with anyone lvl 30, or does it depend on their tr / mmr?

if so, what will happen when ranked closes? 

Or does it all just rely on how many norms you win

replies.body: so if you think normal mmr vs ranked mmr matters, i got into a game with a diamond and plat a couple of days ago, and im s2, in ranked.

Normal and Ranked MMR are separate.

Ranked won't be down for long. You can still play ranked in preseason, it just doesn't mean as much as in the regular season
